playlist_info.name: 【52首最伟大英文诗】英国演员朗读两章合集
playlist_info.creator: 英语有声书减压音乐

songs.name: On Easter Day By Oscar Wilde
Happiness By Raymond Carver
On Marriage By Khalil Gibran
All The World’s A Stage By William Shakespeare
Sonnets From The Portugeuse XIV By Elizabeth Barrett Browning - Franz Schubert- Standchen (Serenade)
Endymion By Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
Warning By Jenny Joseph
Kubla Khan By Samuel Taylor Colerdige. Modest Mussorgsky- Khovanshtchina, Intermezzo, Act 4
The Song Of Wandering Aengus By WB Yeats. Alexander Borodin-Symphony No 2 in B minor Op5 3rdmov Andante
To A Mouse By Robert Burns. Felix Mendelssohn- Bartholdy –Violin Concerto in E minor Op64 3rd mov. Allegro molto vivace
Because I Could Not Stop For Death By Emily Dickinson
I Remember, I Remember By Thomas Hood. Robert Schumann- Kinderscenen Op 15 Am Camin
When Lilacs In The Dooryard Bloomed By Walt Whitman
The Fairies By William Allingham. Leo Delibes- Coppelia Waltz Of The Hours
Bright Star By John Keats. Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart-String Quartet in C major ‘Dissonant’ excerpt from 1st mov
A Dream By Christina Rossetti
The Land Of Counterpane By Robert Louis Stevenson. Georges Bizet- Jeux D’enfants Op22, Impromptu- La Toupie
Love and Friendship By Emily Bronte. Ludwig van Beethoven- Minuet in G
Ode To A Nightingale By John Keats. Gustav Mahler-Symphony No 5 in C sharp, 4th mov, ‘Death In Venice’
Missing You By Penelope Shuttle. Felix Mendelssohn- Bartholdy –Violin Concerto in E minor 2nd mov
A Dream Within A Dream By Edgar Allen Poe
Roses and Rue By Oscar Wilde. Edvard Hagerup Grieg-Peer Gynt Orchestral Suite No 1 Op 46, Aase’s Death
Solitude By Ella Wheeler Wilcox
Jabberwocky By Lewis Carroll. Richard Wagner- Magic Fire Music (Feuerzauber)
A Visit From St Nicholas By Anon. Stephen Darrell Smith- Christmas Spirit
Ecclesiastes 3: 1-8 (King James Version). Attributed to King Solomon. Vivaldi - Concerto ‘In Due Cori’ - 2nd movement (excerpt).
Sonnet 18 by William Shakespeare Beethoven - Piano Sonata No.8 First Movement (excerpt).
Home Thoughts From Abroad by Robert Browning. Dvorak - Symphony No.9 2nd Movement (excerpt).
Friendship by Elizabeth Jennings. Beethoven - Piano Concerto No.5 - 2nd Movement (excerpt).
A Red, Red Rose by Robert Burns. Austin Ince & Frankie Hepburn - Colonel Robertson (excerpt).
I Wandered Lonely As A Cloud by William Wordsworth. Tchaikovsky - Piano Concerto No.1 - 2nd Movement (excerpt).
On The Balcony by D.H. Lawrence. Grieg - Last Spring 2 Elegiac Meleodys (excerpt).
Business Girls by John Betjeman. Satie - Gymnopedie No.2 (excerpt).
To Autumn by John Keats. Borodin - Symphony No.2 - 3rd Movement (excerpt).
Sonnets From The Portuguese by Elizabeth Barrett Browning. Mozart - Symphony No.50 - 3rd Movement (excerpt).
If by Rudyard Kipling. Verdi - La Forza Del Destino (excerpt).
Do Not Stand At My Grave And Weep by Mary Frye. Tchaikovosky - Variations on a Rocco Theme Op.33 (excerpt).
Diary Of A Church Mouse by John Betjeman. Bach - Sleepers Awake (excerpt).
Come Walk With Me by Emily Brontë. Dvorak - Waltz No.1 from Opus 54 (excerpt).
The Lady Of Shalott by Lord Alfred Tennyson. Stephen Darrell Smith & Dan Smith - The Great Glen.
One Flesh by Elizabeth Jennings. Tarrega - Adelita (excerpt).
He Wishes For The Cloths Of Heaven by W.B. Yeats. Mahler - Symphony No.3 - 6th Movement (excerpt).
Sonnet 116 by William Shakespeare. Mahler - Symphony No.3 - 6th Movement (excerpt).
Stop All The Clocks by W.H. Auden. Mahler - Symphony No.1 - 3rd Movement (excerpt).
Adlestrop by Edward Thomas. Vaughan Williams - The Lark Ascending (excerpt).
When We Two Parted by Lord Byron. Tchakovosky - Symphony No.5 - 2nd Movement (excerpt).
Dulce Et Decorum Est by Wilfred Owen. Beethoven - Symphony No.7 - 2nd Movement (excerpt).
Silver by Walter de la Mare. Chopin - Nocturne in C sharp minor (excerpt).
She Walks In Beauty by Lord Byron. Grieg - Peer Gynt Suite No.2 - 4th Movement (excerpt).
Rock Me To Sleep by Elizabeth Akers Allen. Schubert - Rosamunde (excerpt).
Remember by Christina Rossetti. Sor – Allegretto (excerpt).
Last Post by Carol Ann Duffy. Satie - Gymnopedie No.3 (excerpt).
